plot: A young man receives a special letter that leads him to a journey, and at the end makes him ask himself what he has achieved in life and whether or not it is what he dreamed about when he was a kid.
title: Gui Truong Luong
plot_es: A young man receives a special letter that leads him to a journey, and at the end makes him ask himself what he has achieved in life and whether or not it is what he dreamed about when he was a kid.
plot_en: A young man receives a special letter that leads him to a journey, and at the end makes him ask himself what he has achieved in life and whether or not it is what he dreamed about when he was a kid.
